alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Quay County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 4:39AM MST until February 03 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Curry County, Quay County and Roosevelt County. * WHEN...Until Noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40 through Quay County. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Bitterly cold temperatures are also expected this morning with low temperatures in the single digits. Wind chill values as low as -15 are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; Quay County; Roosevelt County
